name: KLM Full Flight | Zurich to Amsterdam | Fokker 70 **With ATC**
description:
A full length, real time full flight video from Zurich to Amsterdam onboard KLM Cityhopper Fokker 70 PH-WXD, operating flight KL1960 from Zurich to Amsterdam on January 30 2016.

**ATC for the full flight courtesy of LiveATC.net**

We board our flight after a 20 minute delay, caused by problems opening the cargo door after the inbound flight from Amsterdam.  Once we're onboard, it isn't long before we receive our departure clearance for Amsterdam, before pushing and taxying out to runway 32.  We make an incredible takeoff from Zurich, getting a great buzzsaw sound from the Rolls-Royce engines, rocketing out of Zurich in a very steep climb.

We get a great view of Switzerland as we climb to FL320, routing up to Amsterdam via France, Luxembourg and Belgium.  The crew contact KLM operations in Amsterdam to verify the state of the passengers with connections (myself included!), and advise us straight away of the status of those connections (thankfully mine wasn't affected!).

We initially commence our approach to runway 27 at Amsterdam Schiphol, before breaking off on short final to land on runway 24 and taxying to the remote stands.

Airline:  KLM Cityhopper
Flight:  KL1960
Aircraft:  Fokker 70 PH-WXD
From:  Zurich (ZRH)
To:  Amsterdam Schiphol (AMS)
Departure:  14:42
Arrival:  15:48
Flight Time:  01:16
Seat:  15F
Flight Path: http://goo.gl/nMEUbx

Filmed from seat 15F.
